# The `ProxyFileSystem` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

By default, this delegates all calls to the underlying file system. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

By default, this delegates all calls to the underlying file system.

This is useful when derived file systems want to override some calls and still proxy other calls.

Definition at line 451 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>.
